name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 藍沢万穂
summary:
寝坊ばかりで時間にルーズなわが妹。
ご近所でも名の通ったアホ女だ・・・。
--
Could you wake her up?
She used to oversleeo and was known by her nigtbors as such girl without sense of time. Today,she had a date with her friend for going to the pool but she was not about to awake. Could you wake her up?

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
• 开发: FUTURE CREATE
  • 发行: FUTURE CREATE
  • 英文名: Tap de PuruMoe!! Maho Aizawa
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: アーケード＆アクション
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=air.TDPMahoAizawaB
